title: The Climbs of the Giro d'Italia 2021 – The Rouleur Quiz
content:
This year’s Giro d’Italia is one for the climbers – but when has it not been?

Our latest quiz tests your knowledge of the mountains from races recent, not so recent, and the one that’s just around the corner. Drawn from all the correct answers, one lucky entrant will win one of our Overcoming – Chris Froome art prints.
author: Peter Stuart
